home.tagline: Your AI-powered travel companion for unforgettable adventures around the world.
home.description: Plan your dream vacation with our intelligent travel assistant that creates personalized itineraries, finds the best deals, and helps you discover hidden gems.

about.title: About TravelingCooker
about.lead: We're passionate about making travel planning effortless and enjoyable for everyone.
about.whatWeDoDesc1: TravelingCooker takes the stress out of trip planning by handling every detail of your journey. From finding the perfect flights and accommodations to curating unique experiences and restaurant recommendations, we create complete travel itineraries tailored to your preferences.
about.whatWeDoDesc2: Our comprehensive approach means you can focus on what matters most - enjoying your trip. We handle the research, bookings, and coordination so you don't have to.
about.personalizedPlanningDesc: Every trip is unique. Our AI considers your interests, budget, travel style, and preferences to create itineraries that are perfectly tailored to you.
about.comprehensiveServiceDesc: From flights and hotels to activities and dining, we handle every aspect of your trip. No need to coordinate with multiple providers.
about.expertKnowledgeDesc: Our AI is trained on vast travel data and local insights to provide recommendations you won't find in typical guidebooks.
about.tellUsDesc: Share your destination, dates, interests, and budget. The more you tell us, the better we can personalize your experience.
about.weCreateDesc: Our AI analyzes your preferences and creates a detailed day-by-day itinerary with flights, accommodations, activities, and dining options.
about.enjoyDesc: Travel with confidence knowing every detail has been planned. Focus on making memories while we handle the logistics.
about.readyToStartDesc: Let us create the perfect trip for you. Complete planning from start to finish.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lead: Have questions or need assistance? We're here to help you plan your perfect trip.
contact.getInTouchDesc: Whether you have questions about our services, need help with an existing booking, or want to provide feedback, our team is ready to assist you.
contact.quickSupportDesc: Need immediate assistance? Use our live chat feature or call us directly during business hours.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
